column4: Is there an Alternate Install for UNE 10.04? The normal download for it doesn't seem to have OEM options, help?
just keep /etc/update-manager/release-upgrades   prompt as lts  and you will ONLY upgrade when the next LTS comes out

Staying away from 10.10 is only one thing, the reason I want an alternate install is because the normal disk doesn't seem to have any way to run an OEM installation, no F6 or "Advanced Options". I'm preparing this for a client, and want to retain the 'Out of the box experience'. (OOBE)
